name: df-area
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(carea, cmpt(s0, crab(s1, cpw(cxp(cr, cr)), wa(wral(s2, cr, wcel(cima(cv(s1), csn(cv(s2))), cima(ccnv(cvol), cr))), wcel(cmpt(s2, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(cv(s1), csn(cv(s2))))), cibl))), citg(s2, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(cv(s0), csn(cv(s2)))))))
comment: Define the area of a subset of ` RR X. RR ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Jun-2015.)
